info.summary:
Stuart E. Madnick works as a Professor in MIT Institute for Data, Systems, and Society/MIT Sloan School of Management, and his\her h-index is 43, g-index is 88. His\Her interests are :
 Working Paper; Information System; Context Interchange; System Dynamics; Data Quality;
